Class VARSite

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.var.common.VARSite

public class VARSite
extends java.lang.Object

The replication site
Represents a replication site object.

Check if this site is one of the owners of the given txMessage

txMsg - TxMessage to be tested for ownership
Returns:

hasReceivedMultiOwnerTx

public boolean hasReceivedMultiOwnerTx(java.lang.String txid,
                                       int numOwners)
Description copied from class: VARSite
Check if the given multi-owner transaction has been received before. If it is so, then it also increments an internal counter to mark that the transaction has been received from one more owner. If the transaction has been received from the expected number of owner sites, then the entry will be removed.

Returns:
true if the multi-owner transaction has been received before.
